Description:
Detects SQL error messages that indicate probing for an injection attack

Author: Bjoern Kimminich
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious SQL Error Messages
Query: sourcetype like 'sql-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%quoted string not properly terminated%' or log like '%you have an error in your sql syntax%' or log like '%unclosed quotation mark%' or log like '%near "*": syntax error%' or log like '%selects to the left and right of union do not have the same number of result columns%')
